bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Ancient method of poisoning people. Fish, meat, or rice are processed in a certain way to poison visitors. Ling nan wei sheng fang 嶺南衛生方 Mj: 廣南挑生殺人，以魚肉延客，對之 行厭勝法，魚肉能反生於人腹中，而人以死 , “When they use the poke life [technique] to kill people by poison in the Guang nan region they attract visitors with fish or meat and apply a magic method. The fish or meat will come to life again in the victim’s abdomen, eventually causing that person’s death”.
